verses.verse: And the <S%H1486>lot<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3318>fell<s%> from <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> by <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, unto the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%>, to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> that goes <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> throughout <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H1008>Beth<s%>–el,
And goes <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H1008>Beth<s%>–el to <S%H3870>Luz<s%>, and passes <S%H5674>along<s%> unto the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H757>Archi<s%> to <S%H5852>Ataroth<s%>,

And goes <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> to the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H3311>Japhleti<s%>, unto the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H1032>Beth<s%>–horon the <S%H8481>nether<s%>, and to <S%H1507>Gezer<s%>: and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> there are at the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.
So the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, took their <S%H5157>inheritance<s%>.

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> was <S%H1366>thus<s%>: even the border of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> on the east <S%H4217>side<s%> was <S%H5853>Ataroth<s%>–addar, unto <S%H1032>Beth<s%>–horon the <S%H5945>upper<s%>;

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> toward the <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H4366>Michmethah<s%> on the north <S%H6828>side<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> unto <S%H8387>Taanath<s%>–shiloh, and <S%H5674>passed<s%> by it on the <S%H4217>east<s%> to <S%H3239>Janohah<s%>;

And it went <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H3239>Janohah<s%> to <S%H5852>Ataroth<s%>, and to <S%H5292>Naarath<s%>, and <S%H6293>came<s%> to <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> at <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

The <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3212>out<s%> from <S%H8599>Tappuah<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> unto the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7071>Kanah<s%>; and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> there were at the <S%H3220>sea<s%>. This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

And the <S%H3995>separate<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> were <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.

And they drove not <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H1507>Gezer<s%>: but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H669>Ephraimites<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> under <S%H4522>tribute<s%>.
